<!--- DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. -->


Converts a number from degrees to radians.



```
toRadians(num: number) -> number
```

### Examples

```kcl
const myVar = toRadians(180)
```

### Arguments

* `num`: `number` (REQUIRED)

### Returns

`number`
